name: Users_addon_accounts_list
description:
A paginated list of addon accounts authorized by this user.

#### Permissions

Addon accounts are visible only to the user that authorized the account.

#### Returns
Returns a JSON object containing `data` and `links` keys.

The `data` key contains an array of at most 10 addon account objects. Each resource in the array is a separate  addon account object and contains the full representation of the addon account.

The `links` key contains a dictionary of links that can be used for [pagination](#tag/Pagination).

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

provider.description: The unique identifier of the addon provider.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the addon account entity.
**display_name**: The user's display name on the third-party service
**profile_url**: The link to user's profile on third-party service
**provider**: The short name of the third-party service
**id**: The unique identifier of the addon account entity.
**links**: URLs to alternative representations of the addon account entity.
**self**: The canonical api endpoint of this addon account
**type**: The type identifier of the addon account entity (`external_accounts`).
